ca.concordia.advanceprog.engine

Class Engine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ca.concordia.advanceprog.engine.Engine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class Engine
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for the game logic including the movements, creation of critters, accounting of the game and so on. In case of restarting, this class would be initialized again and its noteworthy to know that we make the constructor of this class private and we are going to initialize this class using initialEngine which is a static method returning new instance of class
    Author:
    Shahriar Rostami
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void resetMoney()
        this method is responsible for reseting game settings

      • withDraw

        public void withDraw(int amount)
        This is part of accounting system of the our game which will reduce the amount of the user deposited. Then it will refresh the text of label for showing the remaining amount of money
        Parameters:
        amount - represents the amount of money should be reduced from the deposit

      • deposit

        public void deposit(int amount)
        This method will act in opposite of withdraw. it is used full when the player sells the tower for half of the prices it pays for.

      • checkBalance

        public boolean checkBalance()
        It will be called whenever we want to make sure the player wont exceed the amount it has for buying towers.
        Returns:
        will return true/false to indicate if the user positive balance or not.

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(java.awt.image.BufferStrategy strategy)
        It is used to set the private value of strategy for internal usages will assign BufferStrategy to local variable strategy.
        Parameters:
        strategy - value of this parameter should be correspond to the Surface which itself is extending the canvas

      • getStrategy

        public java.awt.image.BufferStrategy getStrategy()
        It is used to set the private value of strategy for internal usages will assign BufferStrategy to local variable strategy. value of this parameter should be correspond to the Surface which itself is extending the canvas

      • playing

        public void playing()
        This public method is playing an important role in the game. It has the game logic inside to be called by the thread frequently.
